current.book_club_page_header_text: Our monthly curated subscription service. Receive best-selling titles in the mail, every new ebook we release, and get 50% off all website purchases.
current.book_club_page_instruction_1_text: Choose your Book Club selection by the end of the month
current.book_club_page_instruction_2_text: Your books will be ready to download on the 1st of every month
current.book_club_page_instruction_3_text: Your selections are shipped throughout the month
current.book_club_page_footer_text: Confused or have any questions? You can email us at bookclub@versobooks.com — we would love to get your feedback! Have general questions about shipping and ebooks? We hope our full FAQs will help.
current.book_club_suggested_products_heading: All Book Club subscribers get 50% off every purchase!
current.book_club_suggested_products_description: If you’re interested in this month’s theme, here are a few suggestions:

settings.text: Get 40% off select titles during the Verso Red Day Sale until March 1!
